description:
The Edelrid Beast Front Tooth is a versatile and durable accessory that can enhance the performance and comfort of the climber on different types of ice or mixed terrain.

  • It’s made of hardened steel and has a single point design that is suitable for ice and mixed climbing
  • This can be easily replaced or adjusted with only one bolt, thanks to the intelligent interchangeable system of the Beast crampon
  • This version is specially designed for mixed climbing, with more teeth and a curved profile on the head for underhand grips and blocking in cracks

name: Edelrid Beast Front Tooth Short
